Query GDC for files

Query GDC for files

file_fields(primary = TRUE)

files(..., token = NULL, fields = file_fields())

Arguments

primary
logical(1) when TRUE (default) return commonly populated field names. Otherwise, return all field names defined in the API.
token
(optional) character(1) security token allowing access to restricted data. See https://docs.gdc.cancer.gov/API/Users_Guide/Getting_Started/#authentication.
fields
character() vector of requested fields. See file_fields() for defined fields.
…
(optional) additional parameters influence file selection. See parameters.

Examples

files <- files()
#> GET request uri:
#> https://gdc-api.nci.nih.gov/files?format=JSON&pretty=FALSE&fields=data_type,updated_datetime,created_datetime,file_name,md5sum,data_format,acl,access,state,file_id,data_category,file_size,submitter_id,type,file_state,experimental_strategy&size=10&from=1
files
#> class: files_list
#> files: 10
#> names:
#>     8bfeb962-e2b3-463a-9fbb-f5c6296f3ec2,
#>     fd8a5011-5dfa-4a9d-ae21-f638b9616153,
#>     49c24b40-f086-42bf-b591-253910f63def, ...,
#>     4dd5ba61-80ac-440f-aced-ce0d3d468f6b,
#>     61cb79e3-ec5f-4211-b41d-64ff63b30d0e
files[1]
#> class: files_list
#> files: 1
#> names:
#>     8bfeb962-e2b3-463a-9fbb-f5c6296f3ec2
#> fields:
#>     data_type(1)
#>     updated_datetime(1)
#>     created_datetime(1)
#>     file_name(1)
#>     md5sum(1)
#>     data_format(1)
#>     acl(1)
#>     access(1)
#>     state(1)
#>     data_category(1)
#>     file_size(1)
#>     submitter_id(1)
#>     type(1)
#>     file_state(1)
#>     experimental_strategy(1)
unlist(files[[1]])
#>                                                                           data_type 
#>                                                        "Annotated Somatic Mutation" 
#>                                                                    updated_datetime 
#>                                                  "2016-09-29T21:15:55.100009-05:00" 
#>                                                                    created_datetime 
#>                                                  "2016-05-04T16:05:36.917600-05:00" 
#>                                                                           file_name 
#>                          "8bfeb962-e2b3-463a-9fbb-f5c6296f3ec2.vep.reheader.vcf.gz" 
#>                                                                              md5sum 
#>                                                  "ace85792006140a9b4895976ecba725e" 
#>                                                                         data_format 
#>                                                                               "VCF" 
#>                                                                                 acl 
#>                                                                         "phs000178" 
#>                                                                              access 
#>                                                                        "controlled"

#> "TCGA-E3-A3E3-01A-11D-A20C-08_TCGA-E3-A3E3-10A-01D-A20C-08_somaticsniper_annotated"
